basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: IT Project Manager | Healthcare IT | Microsoft 365 • SharePoint • Teams • ServiceNow
basics.summary: Experienced IT professional with expertise in healthcare IT project management, end-user support, and technology implementation. Skilled at coordinating cross-functional teams, managing vendor relationships, and overseeing IT projects including software upgrades, migrations, and system implementations. Adept at documenting project plans, maintaining timelines, and delivering actionable reporting for stakeholders while ensuring HIPAA compliance and secure, efficient IT operations.

work.name: Unbound Digital
work.position: Help Desk Manager / IT Project Manager
highlights: Managed IT projects and help desk support for 100+ clients, including healthcare organizations, ensuring on-time completion and client satisfaction
Led company-wide migrations from on-premises servers to Microsoft 365, including Exchange, SharePoint, Teams, and Intune
Implemented IT policies and workflows to maintain HIPAA-compliant systems and improve operational efficiency
Coordinated with vendors, cross-functional teams, and clients to ensure clear communication and timely project delivery
Created project documentation, timelines, and dashboards to provide actionable insights for leadership and stakeholders

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Managed digital lab systems and clinical IT infrastructure
Collaborated with clinicians to implement and maintain technology solutions supporting patient care
Ensured proper data handling and security in compliance with healthcare standards

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Oversaw daily operations and supported IT systems within the clinical environment
Coordinated with staff and vendors on technology deployments and maintenance
Ensured compliance with data security and clinical standards

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Supported enterprise clients with software, hardware, and IT infrastructure issues
Managed deployments using Docker, cloud infrastructure, and server administration
Developed technical documentation and trained end-users to optimize workflows

skills.name: Technical Expertise
keywords: Microsoft 365, SharePoint, Teams, Azure, Active Directory, Intune
